pli-tv-pvr12:1.4: [Sp.5.359](): _Matikammaṃ vuccati mantaggahaṇaṃ_, “Taking advice is called  _matikammaṃ_.” The sub-commentary, [Vmv.5.359](), adds: _Mantaggahaṇanti tesaṃ vicāraṇāgahaṇaṃ, suttantikattherānaṃ, vinayadharattherānañca adhippāyagahaṇanti attho_, “_Mantaggahaṇan_: learning from them by investigation; the meaning is learning the meaning from the experts on the discourse and the experts on the Monastic Law.”
